:py:mod:`nexoclom2.utilities.make_acceptable`
=============================================

.. py:module:: nexoclom2.utilities.make_acceptable


Module Contents
---------------


Functions
~~~~~~~~~

.. autoapisummary::

   nexoclom2.utilities.make_acceptable.make_acceptable



.. py:function:: make_acceptable(inputs)

   
   Takes a Python input-type class and converts it to a saveable format.

   The input classes (Geometry, etc.) have objects that can not be stored in
   the TinyDB format (cannot be converted to json). This function cleans
   things up.















   ..
       !! processed by numpydoc !!
